definition: any weakening or degeneration (especially through lack of use), to weaken or degenerate
details:
noun
- any weakening or degeneration (especially through lack of use)
= synonyms: withering
- a decrease in size of an organ caused by disease or disuse
= synonyms: wasting, wasting away
verb
- to weaken or degenerate
= example: to weaken or degenerate
